qas.question: What personality trait did Feynman acquire from his mother?
What person influenced Feynman to think deeply?
What electronic instrument did Feynman repair as a child?
As a grade school child he created an electronic device while his parents were away, what was it?
What talent did Feynman have, even early in his childhood?
What personality trait did Feynman hide from his mother?
What person influenced Feynman to think shallow?
What electronic instrument did Feynman break as a child?
What electronic device was Feynman restricted from building?
What talent did Feynman develop only after his childhood?

context: The young Feynman was heavily influenced by his <a1_0><b6_0>father<b6_0/><a1_0/>, who encouraged him to ask questions to challenge orthodox thinking, and who was always ready to teach Feynman something new. From his mother he gained the sense of <a0_0><b5_0>humor<b5_0/><a0_0/> that he had throughout his life. As a child, he had a talent for <a4_0><b9_0>engineering<b9_0/><a4_0/>, maintained an experimental laboratory in his home, and delighted in repairing <a2_0><b7_0>radios<b7_0/><a2_0/>. When he was in grade school, he created a <a3_0><b8_0>home burglar alarm system<b8_0/><a3_0/> while his parents were out for the day running errands.
